note.p: Career: Worked as an apothecary; practised as a physician, Bath; published "Reflections on the use and abuse of Bath waters" (1757) which caused controversy between him and Drs Lucas and Oliver, which ruined his practice; went to London; Physician, Middlesex Hospital (1764); went to Germany, due to money problems and lived in Dresden, then Berlin; Physician to Frederick the Great
Notes: Note on election certificate: 'Novr 16 [1758] Ballotted & rejected'
